alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hamilton; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 12:10PM EDT until June 21 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Union County in northern Florida... Columbia County in northern Florida... Southeastern Hamilton County in northern Florida... * Until 1245 PM EDT. * At 1210 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wellborn, or 7 miles south of White Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Columbia, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield and Suwannee Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
